How To Use¶

Introduction¶

The contents of this package include two variable computation/extraction routines, several methods implementing CWIPP algorithms and a collection of plotting functions.

The key routines are summarized below:

  • runCWIPP.py - Runs the plume rise model for a general case (in predictive mode). General steps are summarized in Basic Usage below.

  • runLESanalysis.py - Performs optimization of CWIPP model using synthetic WRF-SFIRE LES plume data. Details can be found here.

Basic Usage¶

runCWIPP.py contains sample code for applying the CWIPP model in a forecast setting to predict the vertical smoke profile of a real-world wildfire plume

Result:
